targets.query:
from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "hourly_speeds")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> group(columns: ["isp"])
  |> mean()
  |> keep(columns: ["isp", "_value"])
  |> yield(name: "avg_by_isp")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r.target_domain }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "retcode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 0)
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Success: r._value}))
  |> yield(name: "success")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "retcode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 28)
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Timeout: r._value}))
  |> yield(name: "timeout")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "retcode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value != 28)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value != 0)
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Other: r._value}))
  |> yield(name: "other")

data = from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "retcode")
  |> group()

tot = data
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

success = data
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 0)
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, status: "success", _value: if tot._value > 0 then float(v: r._value) / float(v: tot._value) * 100.0 else 0.0 }))

failed = data
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value != 0)
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, status: "fail", _value: if tot._value > 0 then float(v: r._value) / float(v: tot._value) * 100.0 else 0.0 }))

union(tables: [success, failed])
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "retcode_success_fail_pct")

data = from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "retcode")
  |> group()

success = data
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 0)
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ category: "Success", count: r._value }))

timeout = data
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 28)
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ category: "Timeout", count: r._value }))

other = data
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value != 28 and r._value != 0)
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ category: "Other", count: r._value }))

union(tables: [success, timeout, other])
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "retcode_counts")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "server_city")
  |> group(columns: ["target_domain"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "_value")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "unique_locations")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "current")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "hop_count")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "hops")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> group()
  |> quantile(q: 0.50, method: "estimate_tdigest")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "P50 (Median)", _value: r._value }))
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "p50")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> group()
  |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "estimate_tdigest")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "P95", _value: r._value }))
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "p95")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> group()
  |> quantile(q: 0.99, method: "estimate_tdigest")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "P99", _value: r._value }))
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "p99")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "retcode")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "retcode")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "http_code")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "http_code")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> group(columns: ["isp"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "by_isp")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 1000000.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "by_location")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "http_code" or r["_field"] == "retcode")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "http_and_retcode")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "server_city")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "locations_over_time")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "retcode")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value == 0 then 1.0 else 0.0 }))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "reliability")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps")
  |> group(columns: ["target_domain"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "by_domain")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps" or r["_field"] == "hop_count")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "multi_field")

panels.title: Speed vs Network Hop Count (Dual Axis)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps" or r["_field"] == "hop_count" or r["_field"] == "http_code" or r["_field"] == "retcode")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "isp", "location", "target_domain", "speed_mbps", "hop_count", "http_code", "retcode", "server_city", "server_country"])
  |> yield(name: "details")

from(bucket: "speed-test-metrics")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speed_test")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_mbps" or r["_field"] == "server_lat" or r["_field"] == "server_lon")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.server_lat and exists r.server_lon)
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "geomap")
